manipulated_prompt_obj.content:

Grids have empty cells marked with "▢" and filled cells marked with "X".

Target grid:

▢ ▢ X ▢ ▢
▢ X X ▢ ▢
X X X X X
▢ X X ▢ ▢
▢ ▢ X ▢ ▢

Distractor grid 1:

▢ ▢ X ▢ ▢
▢ ▢ X ▢ ▢
X X X X X
▢ ▢ X ▢ ▢
▢ ▢ X ▢ ▢

Distractor grid 2:

▢ ▢ X ▢ ▢
▢ X X X ▢
X X X X X
▢ ▢ X ▢ ▢
▢ ▢ X ▢ ▢

Instruction: Describe the target grid.
Generate the referring expression starting with the tag "Expression: " for the given target grid. Omit any other text.

message.content: Expression: The target grid has an X in the center of the 5x5 grid, surrounded by eight empty cells, with a cross-shaped pattern of four X's in the corners and one in the middle, and the rest of the cells being empty.
